title: Dmitri Sasin
text:
Dmitri Andreyevich Sasin (; born 21 August 1996) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player who plays for <a href="FC%20Akron%20Tolyatti">Akron Tolyatti</a>.
Club career.
He made his professional debut in the <a href="Russian%20Professional%20Football%20League">Russian Professional Football League</a> for <a href="FC%20Tom-2%20Tomsk">FC Tom-2 Tomsk</a> on 19 July 2014 in a game against <a href="FC%20Yakutiya%20Yakutsk">FC Yakutiya Yakutsk</a>.
He made his <a href="Russian%20Premier%20League">Russian Premier League</a> debut for <a href="FC%20Tom%20Tomsk">FC Tom Tomsk</a> on 3 March 2017 in a game against <a href="FC%20Rostov">FC Rostov</a>.
